Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • Camera

  • public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a class used to represent a camera in the Bird Watching Game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Camera(int w, int h)
      Creates an instance of the Camera class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Camera

        public Camera(int w,
              int h)
        Creates an instance of the Camera class. This constructor assigns the x position and y position attributes of the Camera to place the camera at the center of the screen.
        Parameters:
        w - the width of the screen
        h - the height of the screen
